projects.title: SAMS
projects.description: SAMS streamlines the full lifecycle of physical assets across properties and departments. It helps teams register, track, audit, and label assets with efficient QR-based workflows, clear ownership, and strong accountability.

projects.title: MorphAgent
projects.description: MorphAgent: Instantly spoof user agent & touch points in Firefox. 70+ profiles, per-site rules, privacy-focused.

projects.title: Guest-IT Portal
projects.description: A Modern, Feature-Rich Guest IT Portal Application built with React, TypeScript, and Supabase. Escalation tool for Hotel/Resorts for getting guest request directly on Portal.

projects.title: RustPing
projects.description: A fast, Rust-powered network monitoring tool inspired by PRTG. Monitor network health, track live logs, and detect failures in real-time. Lightweight, efficient, and built for reliability.

projects.title: Rust-Crypt
projects.description: A simple yet powerful file encryption tool built with Rust. Securely encrypt and decrypt files using AES-256-GCM encryption with password-based key derivation.

projects.title: GPM-DarkMode
projects.description: Unofficial dark mode support for GPM Software (Supports Firefox and Chromium based browsers). This tool enables dark mode, enhancing UI accessibility.

projects.title: LogAnalyzerPro
projects.description: LogAnalyzerPro is a versatile tool for analyzing log files with features like filtering, search, and export, ideal for developers and sysadmins.

projects.title: InRoomDining
projects.description: This project is a modern web application designed to enhance the dining experience for hotel guests by enabling them to order meals and services directly from their room.

projects.title: euclidOS
projects.description: Customize your phone with euclidOS: a beautiful, open-source Android skin. Built with modern web technologies for a stunning user experience.

projects.title: namashivalaya.org
projects.description: Official Website of Shivalaya Arunachala Hotels and Resort, Built with HTML, CSS, JS, BOOTSTRAP, SaSS

projects.title: CyberKeyGen
projects.description: CyberKeyGen is a secure React & TypeScript-based password generator with a sleek, responsive UI, real-time strength analysis, and advanced security features.

projects.title: CherishOS
projects.description: Customize your phone with CherishOS: a beautiful, open-source Android skin. Modern design meets functionality.

projects.title: CodeLogger
projects.description: A Python script that captures key events of Windows, Mac or Linux machines and outputs the log as code.txt on the script file directory. Educational purpose only.

projects.title: DDOS-ATTACK
projects.description: This educational script simulates a DDoS attack to help users understand its mechanics, but should not be used for malicious purposes.

projects.title: CleanWindowsPro
projects.description: Optimize Windows system performance and stability with this script designed to clean junk files and repair corrupted system files. Achieve better efficiency with ease.

projects.title: Ace Redirect
projects.description: This app is designed to offer a seamless user experience and provide easy access to all of the services offered by Ace Financials Software.

projects.title: 24Online-Server Portal
projects.description: Customizable website template for 24Online-Server clients and administrators, designed specifically for Paul John Hotels and Resorts.

projects.title: Pixel-Pulse
projects.description: Pixel Pulse keeps chosen browser sessions active with customizable heartbeats while offering a sleek, theme-aware popup interface.
